resources.string:
This app allows you to send and receive SMS messages in an automated, repeatable manner while logging as much metadata as possible.

The messages are sent from the keywords list.

Use the menu options to start or configure the sending process

All log data is stored as csv files in the sdcard under the 'smstester' folder.
Default phone number to send msgs to
Where to store the log files
Delay between messages, in milliseconds (default: 1000 ms)
Send SMS as data messages not text
Append tracking metadata to message for better analytics
Keep running the test until I stop it
Enter target phone number for test messages:
Requesting permission to send test messages.
The recipient accepted your request, starting to send test messages.
The recipient denied your request, canceling.
Sending the header message to describe data format.
